text: Hello!
hello
Would you like to start
I think that Republicans are far more hypocritical
They say that they want freedom and then restrict abortion rights
They complain about the education system but don't want to fund it
What do you think?
I agree with you and I'm struggling to think of an area Democrats are hypocritical in
Some democrats are hypocritical like Joe Manchin
He's more of a liar than a hypocrite
I suppose he's hypocritical in that he complained that the Senate doesn't do anything, but he refuses to do anything himself even when he's the only one needed to get things done
right? I think Biden has been pretty good about keeping his promises. Better than Obama. Obama made several promises that he didn't carry out.
But as a whole the Democrats don't seem hypocritical to me, just ineffective
The Republicans were also hypocritical when it comes to Supreme Court nominations
Yes
chastising Democrats and then doing exactly what they said Democrats should not do
Their reason for not seating a Justice during Obama's last term was immediately tossed aside to get an unqualified Barrett on the court
yep!
I think their biggest hypocrisy is their moral outrage
at least Obama's choice is effective in the Justice Department
If there's a school shooting like, I don't know, the one we just had
They act outraged if anyone brings up guns
Don't disrespect the memory of the children by mentioning guns
we've had several mass shootings over the last year and Republicans act outraged but seem like they want to  hand a gun to every American
I think all politicians are hypocritical when it comes to campaign donations and stock market investments.
And they don't want to talk politics but that's all their abortion stance is
Yes
Republicans are super hypocritical in talking about how social security is lacking but then they raid "surpluses" from it...
At least they've stopped trying to repeal healthcare, for now
they want freedom to make their own decisions about their life and mask wearing but then they won't give me freedom on whether I want to have a child or not
Oh the coronavirus debacle. I wasnt even thinking about that
I think the majority of the Republican platform is hypocritical
they just want whatever puts money in their pockets
Yes
